H1.text: what type of music did mozart composed. Chamber Music

H2.text: what type of music did mozart composed. Concerto

H3.text: what type of music did mozart composed. Opera

A4.text: Mozart wrote many of his best‑known works, including his last three symphonies, culminating in the Jupiter Symphony.

A5.text: He produced operas in each of the prevailing styles: opera buffa, such as Le nozze di Figaro, Don Giovanni, and Così fan tutte; opera seria, such as Idomeneo; and Singspiel, of which Die Zauberflöte is the most famous example.

A6.text: All the symphonies in this table except Nos. 2, 3 and 37 (which are spurious) have links to scores in the Neue Mozart-Ausgabe
